description:
Corazon`s double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Zeit läuft ab! – Holt euch die Operations-Frucht!
Le compte à rebours est lancé ! S`emparer du Ope Ope no Mi !
The Time Is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!
Toki Sameru! Op-Op no Mi o Ubae!
Гонка со временем. Стащить фрукт Опе-Опе
時迫る! オペオペの実を奪え!
